projects.name: Traffic Light Management Biased on Traffic Load
projects.description: Developed a system for traffic light prediction based on real-time traffic load data, reducing congestion by up to 20%. Utilized machine learning and data analytics to process sensor data, achieving an accuracy of 90% in traffic load prediction. Engineered and deployed advanced algorithms for timing adjustments, leading to a 25% reduction in traffic congestion and a 30% improvement in overall traffic flow efficiency.

projects.name: License Plate Detection
projects.description: Developed and integrated machine learning models for image processing to identify license plates with 98% precision, cutting down manual labor by 60% and improving overall operational efficiency. Engineered a license plate detection system achieving 95% accuracy in reading vehicle plates from images and video streams, enhancing automated toll collection efficiency by 30% and reducing manual checks by 70%. Improved efficiency and security in transportation and surveillance systems, leading to a 30% reduction in toll collection times and a 50% decrease in parking violations.

projects.name: Mental Health App Prototype
projects.description: Designed an innovative mental health app prototype featuring personalized resource recommendations and self-assessment tools. Aim to provide a confidential and accessible platform for users to discuss their feelings openly.

experiences.description: Executed comprehensive simulations of phishing, malware, DDoS, SQL injection, and MitM attacks; identified and mitigated vulnerabilities, reducing potential security breaches by 40% and enhancing overall system integrity. Enhanced cybersecurity posture by integrating Wireshark, Metasploit, Nessus, and Burp Suite into the security protocol, conducted comprehensive assessments, decreasing system vulnerabilities by 35% and improving threat detection efficiency by 50%. Executed detailed risk assessments to uncover and address 10+ security vulnerabilities, significantly enhancing overall system security and reducing potential threat exposure by 30.

soft_skills: Enhanced team synergy through clear and concise communication, resulting in a 30% reduction in project bottlenecks and a 25% increase in overall efficiency.
full_output.name: Rakshit Rawat
